long_description: Stay hydrated while on the move. The Gregrory Tempo D1.5 Hydration waistpack offers easy access to hydration, and stable carry of your running essentials. Fluid Mechanics design means the shape of the waistpack allows a runner to carry essentials while maintaining natural stride and arm swing. Hydrapak(R) DualBot 24 fl. oz. water bottle features a sport top for quick hydration. Water bottle pocket accommodates most bottles up to 24 fl. oz.; diagonal bottle carry offers effortless access while on the move. Dual stretch accessory pockets and twin zippered waistbelt pockets offer plenty of storage for small items such as keys and energy snacks. Compression strap secures the fit. The Gregory Tempo D1.5 hydration waistpack features reflective graphics for visibility in low light.
short_description: Stay hydrated while on the move. The Gregrory Tempo D1.5 Hydration waistpack offers easy access to hydration, and stable carry of your running essentials.
